string-array.name: pyke_passive
string-array.item: When Pyke is hidden from enemies, he regenerates damage that he has recently taken from champions. Pyke also cannot gain extra Maximum Health from any source, and instead gains Bonus AD.

string-array.name: pyke_first_ability
string-array.item: Pyke either stabs an enemy in front of him or pulls an enemy towards him.

string-array.name: pyke_second_ability
string-array.item: Pyke enters Camouflage and gains significant Move Speed that decays over time.

string-array.name: pyke_third_ability
string-array.item: Pyke dashes and leaves behind a phantom that will return to him, stunning enemy champions along its path.

string-array.name: pyke_fourth_ability
string-array.item: Pyke blinks to and executes low health enemies, allowing him to cast this spell again and granting additional gold to an ally who assists.
